tool_description: Compares portfolio performance against benchmarks calculating relative returns, tracking error, information ratio, and other comparative metrics.

portfolio_returns.description: Array of portfolio returns over time

benchmark_returns.description: Array of benchmark returns (same time periods as portfolio)

timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for return periods

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data: At least 10 return periods required for meaningful comparison statistics.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in ISO 8601 format.
Data quality error: Returns arrays contain invalid values (NaN or infinite values).
usage: Provide portfolio returns, benchmark returns, and timestamps to generate comprehensive performance comparison metrics and relative performance analysis.

excess_returns.description: Array of period-by-period excess returns (portfolio - benchmark)

tracking_error.description: Annualized standard deviation of excess returns

information_ratio.description: Ratio of excess return to tracking error

up_capture.description: Upside capture ratio during positive benchmark periods

down_capture.description: Downside capture ratio during negative benchmark periods

outperformance_periods.description: Number of periods where portfolio outperformed benchmark

cumulative_excess_return.description: Total cumulative excess return over the period
